info.title: Azure Database Migration Service Resource Provider

GetUserTablesPostgreSqlTaskInput.description: Input for the task that gets the list of tables for a provided list of PostgreSQL databases.

connectionInfo.description: Information for connecting to PostgreSQL source

selectedDatabases.description: List of PostgreSQL databases for which to collect tables

GetUserTablesPostgreSqlTaskOutput.description: Output for the task that gets the list of tables for a provided list of PostgreSQL databases.

databaseName.description: The database this result is for

tables.description: List of valid tables found for this database

validationErrors.description: Validation errors associated with the task
